description:
***** LET THE MULTIPLAYER BEGIN! *****
• Gather the most awesome monster team
• Challenge your friends in epic battles!
• Collect monstrous rewards and win exclusive new monsters
• Be the best and enter Numa's Hall of Fame!


===== MILLIONS OF PLAYERS! =====
***** "This is the most awesome game on the planet!!!!!"
***** "Best game ever!"

THE PRESS ACCLAIMS IT: 
"Some of the best-looking graphics seen on the device." - Slide to Play
"If this game doesn't charm you, you very well might be lacking a soul." - Gamezebo
"A clever, rewarding, and adorable game." - 148 Apps

RAISE AN ADORABLE AND POWERFUL TEAM OF MONSTERS
• More than 20 endearing monsters to collect!
• Feed, play and train them to make them stronger

FIGHT MINIONS OF CHAOS
• Journey across 36 battle zones on 4 islands
• Engage in epic battles with up to 6 monsters!

AN ORIGINAL PAPERCRAFT UNIVERSE
• Discover a unique, magical, and fun atmosphere!
• Enjoy original 3D graphics in a paper world

YOUR OWN MONSTER TRAINING GROUND
• Build the perfect kingdom to boost their power
• Tons of buildings, habitats and custom options

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft 
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.

_____________________________________________

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app.
trackCensoredName: Monster Life - Collect and battle cute mini monsters!
trackName: Monster Life - Collect and battle cute mini monsters!
